commenter_a: I think this poem/speech misses a huge issue and ignores the obvious. Humans as a whole are failing. This isn't just a man's issue. I see, daily, women tearing other women down. Calling them the same things you hear. It is a problem from all sides. We have failed to raise children with respect, love, and caring. That is the issue. To suggest it is only males is dishonest. We should accept it is a societal issue and not a male/female issue.
